name: a
description: - Often times, fans of the world famous game, struggle a lot to find the greatest clips of their favourite footballer. This website  could be used to find any and all clips of any plater that is searched for. ## ### KEY FEATURES: - This project would scour any source of videos all over the internet to do its job and fulfill its purpose.  - No limitation as to which player or which game the user is searching for. The project is revolutionary. ## ### TECH STACK - Front end: React.js - Back end: Git Version Control, VS Code, npm ## ### WHY THIS PROJECT: - I love the game and I have often found it difficult to spot a specific clip of a play that I was longing to watch, a project like this would help many fans find exactly what they're looking for.
